title: (x) ID - Deco, humanist, varied width? - Riesling {Mike F}
content:
Here's one of those Optima-ish typefaces that I just can't nail. Any ideas anyone? I have lots of similar typefaces but not this one.

Thanks,  
Scott

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820110539im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Oceania_5839.png)
author: sdaris

comments.content: What's the context? It might be custom.
That's a Bright Ideas (defunct) font called Riesling - manually heavied up a bit. A Web search should find it easy enough.

I don't know what DrDoc means by "what's the context"? It was found online on someone's promo graphics. Most logo and type display graphics are customized, of course. I just want to know the base typeface.

Ok, just found it, and yes, Mike F was correct - it's Riesling. Thanks all - fast help as usual :)
